name: pyspider-dev
description: Production-ready PySpider web crawler development toolkit. Covers GET/POST requests, proxy management, header rotation, error handling, pagination, and enterprise-grade crawling patterns. Includes production SOP with dual-mode workflows, strategy patterns (A-E), and automation scripts. Use when: (1) Creating new PySpider crawlers, (2) Implementing web scraping tasks, (3) Handling complex crawling scenarios with proxies and retries, (4) Refactoring production crawlers
